Interface IFacultyRequestManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
FacultyRequestManager
public interface IFacultyRequestManager
This interface is the interface for the FacultyRequestManager class.

  • Method Details

    • addTransferRequest

      void addTransferRequest(Faculty f, Project p, String replacement)
      This method is used to view all projects that the faculty is registered to.
      Parameters:
      f - The faculty whose projects are to be viewed.
      p - The project that the faculty is requesting to be allocated to.
      replacement - The ID of the replacement faculty member.

    • viewHistory

      void viewHistory(Faculty user, int page)
      This method is used to view the past project history.
      Parameters:
      user - The faculty whose projects are to be viewed.
      page - The page number of the projects to be viewed.

    • viewInbox

      void viewInbox(Faculty user, int page)
      This method is used to get the inbox of the faculty.
      Parameters:
      user - The faculty whose projects are to be viewed.
      page - The page number of the projects to be viewed.

    • viewPending

      void viewPending(Faculty user)
      This method is used to print the pending requests of the faculty.
      Parameters:
      user - The faculty whose projects are to be viewed.

    • getPendingReqs

      ArrayList<Request> getPendingReqs(Faculty user)
      This method is used to get a list of all the pending requests of the faculty.
      Parameters:
      user - The faculty whose projects are to be viewed.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of all the pending requests of the faculty.

    • saveChanges

      void saveChanges()
      This method is to save the changes made to the request.

    • approveTitleChange

      void approveTitleChange(Request r)
      This method is used to approve the title change request.
      Parameters:
      r - The request to be approved.

    • rejectRequest

      void rejectRequest(TitleRequest r)
      This method is to reject the title change request.
      Parameters:
      r - The request to be rejected

    • getPendingRequestbyID

      Request getPendingRequestbyID(Faculty user, int id)
      This method is used to get the pending request by ID.
      Parameters:
      user - The user who is viewing the request by ID.
      id - The ID which is used to call request.
      Returns:
      Yes or no, if there are pending requests.
